ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 28 Feb 2000 kim@... wrote:
>
> 11 hour Hate trip, half bubble up despite 3 deaths (having a
> monk and 2 rogues in the party will do that :). Killed the

Oh yeah, our group only had 1 cleric (seems SOP is to try to
get two clerics per group), so I had to spend a lot of time
playing the lute (didn't get to try out the six-note for 3
fights :). With the combat lag you get with that many people,
I pretty much have the timing for weaving 3 songs down to
second nature now. I was actually confused last night in Guk
when I was subconciously counting in my head when I should
switch songs, and I got the song pulse message before I'd
finished counting. Do I finish counting, or switch now? :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
